name: Twisty Magic Balloon
description:
Have a balloon party!

Come to help the lady make up pretty balloon patterns to prepare for parties!
Control the direction of balloons to make up pretty patterns based on the tips.
Colorful roket, ship and car bring you strong sense of achievement.
But be careful, you should plan the order before make up. Overlap will make balloons explode!
Different make up ways may exist for same pattern. Awaiting you to explore!
Besides, levels of time limit are waiting for you to challenge how fast you can be !
